00554                 static void threadUpdate()
00555                 {
00556                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00557                         {
00558                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._processQueuedSounds();
00559                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._updateBuffers();
00560                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(10));
00561                         }
00562                 }
